TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileResponseElement extends System.Web.Caching.ResponseElement

summary.span: 表示儲存為檔案之輸出快取區項目的一部分。

span.span: Represents part of an output-cache entry, stored as a file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表輸出快取項目 （而非標頭中） 的內文部分。The class represents the body portion (instead of the header) of an output-cache entry. 將資料從物件可儲存成下列部分或所有檔案。The data from a object can be stored as either part or all of a file. ASP.NET 和自訂輸出快取提供者可以將回應傳回多個部分，在使用的任何組合物件。Both ASP.NET and custom output-cache providers can return a response in multiple parts, using any combination of objects. 比方說，提供者可以傳回的回應已分割成三個不同物件，而且每個物件可以擷取從位移到不同的實體檔案。For example, a provider can return a response that is segmented into three different objects, and each object can be retrieved from an offset into a different physical file.

MemberSignature.Value: public FileResponseElement (string path, long offset, long length);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string path, int64 offset, int64 length) cil managed
Public Sub New (path As String, offset As Long, length As Long)
public: FileResponseElement(System::String ^ path, long offset, long length);
new System.Web.Caching.FileResponseElement : string * int64 * int64 -> System.Web.Caching.FileResponseElement

span.span: The fully qualified path for the file.

param.name: offset
param.span: 檔案中字串開始的位置。

span.span: The position in the file where the string starts.

param.name: length
param.span: 於位移處開始的資料長度，此位移表示檔案中 定義的輸出快取區資料。

span.span: The length of the data, starting at the offset that represents the output-cache data in the file defined by .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果完整的輸出快取區回應包含在單一檔案中，提供者初始化類別使用，位移為零，且整個檔案的大小相同的長度。If the complete output-cache response is contained in a single file, a provider initializes the class by using an offset of zero, and a length equal to the size of the whole file. 如果完成的輸出快取區回應包含之檔案的組件中，提供者初始化類別使用輸出快取區回應的開始位置，將檔案和輸出快取區回應中所儲存的大小相等長度的位移該檔案。If the complete output cache response is contained in only part of a file, a provider initializes the class by using the offset in the file where the output cache response starts, and a length equal to the size of the output-cache response that is stored in that file.

Public ReadOnly Property Length As Long
public: property long Length { long get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得從位移處開始的資料大小，此位移包含 執行個體的資料。

span.span: Gets the size of the data, starting at the offset that contains the data for a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果完整的輸出快取區回應包含在單一檔案中，輸出快取提供者初始化類別所使用的整份檔案大小相同的長度。If the complete output-cache response is contained in a single file, an output cache provider initializes the class by using a length equal to the size of the whole file. 如果完成的輸出快取區回應包含之檔案的組件中，提供者初始化類別會儲存在該檔案的輸出快取區回應的大小相同的長度。If the complete output cache response is contained in only part of a file, a provider initializes the class by using a length equal to the size of the output-cache response that is stored in that file.

summary.span: 取得檔案中來自 執行個體的資料開始的位置。

span.span: Gets the position in the file where the data from a instance starts.
The starting point of the data in the file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果完整的輸出快取區回應包含在單一檔案中，提供者，初始化使用，位移為零，如果完整的輸出快取的回應的類別會包含在檔案的唯一部分，提供者初始化類別使用輸出快取區回應的開始位置的檔案中的位移。If the complete output-cache response is contained in a single file, a provider initializes the class by using an offset of zero, If the complete output cache response is contained in only part of a file, a provider initializes the class by using the offset in the file where the output cache response starts.
